评论概述: Perfect Quality LURANEE Women's Workout Athletic Tank Tops
评论详情: This women's sleeveless yoga shirts is made of high-quality sports fabric, soft and stretchy, quick drying, and breathable fabric to keep you dry and comfortable while exercising.

This top overall is great! The pink color is so pretty and the material is great quality. I would say it runs a little big so if you want it more form fitting size down. I got a medium and I think a small would've been better for me. It still fits it's just looser. I'm 135 lbs., 36 C on top.

评论概述: A cute print and a cute style…but the armholes are cut odd.
评论详情: This LURANEE tank top is a cute print. The material is soft and stretchy. I chose a size small, based on the bust measurements for each size. In person the color is as shown in the listing, and the fit is as I expected. The armholes are cut oddly, so they protrude slightly on the front. The construction of the top is otherwise good, with no notable issues such as fabric flaws, seam rips, or messy/missed stitches, etc. I do like the neutral white and gray camo print, as it’s versatile enough to wear with a large variety of colors on the bottom. I always wash clothes prior to wearing them, so this was washed on warm with a delicates bag on gentle cycle. It was then hung on a drying rack to air dry. It dried with no fading, shrinking or pilling. I do like the comfort, camo print and stretch of this front-twist top. I find the front crossed hem to be a unique look and very flattering. In addition to the issues with the armholes, if I could change just one small thing, it would be to eliminate the continuation of the band at the hem on the back. I don’t care for the look of it or the way it hangs on my body, but it doesn’t really affect how it fits or wears. It’s just a personal preference. Overall I like this top, but question how much I’ll wear it with the protruding armholes. I really wanted to give a glowing recommendation for the LURANEE workout tank, but due to the issue with the armholes, I can’t wholeheartedly recommend it. IF having the armholes stick out a little on the front wouldn’t bother you or you’ll be wearing a jacket over it, then this top is cute and it may be just what you need. But for me, I’ll get my wear out of this one, but likely won’t order another one.

The cute pink and red leopard print definitely caught my eye 😍🐆 After reading the reviews saying it was sized smaller across the bust, I decided to size up. In a stretchy top like this, I’d usually order a size Large, but in this one, I ordered size XL. I am: 6’tall, 42” Bust, 34” Waist, 46” Hips, approximately 190-195 lbs.  The XL fits a bit big, especially in the armpits, but does have a comfortable fit across my larger bust and tummy area, so I’m happy about that. With my sewing machine, it’s a quick and easy alteration to take in the armpit seam. I actually do this quite a lot, usually with dresses, as when I size up to accommodate my wider hips and thighs, the bust area is often too big.  Love the print, twist front and breathable fabric. Good quality and I feel happy wearing this 😄, so I expect to get a lot of wear out of this one and do highly recommend 👍🏻🥇🐆
This woman's workout top is well made. I like the cross hem in the front. It gives the shirt alot of style.  Lightweight material. Fits nicely. Good workout top.
This top is made of a decent material, it is kind of heavy to workout in though. Definitely not a shirt for sweating in. The fit is very boxy on me, not flattering.

This shirt fit weird. There was so much extra room around the arm holes, and it was wide at the chest although still tight across the upper back and the front of my chest. The crossover being in the front makes it a weird length. For the cut of the shirt, I think a racer back would have been more flattering/worked better for the style. It is an athletic material, but it could be more wicking and lighter weight if I had to change it. Overall it will work fine for working out, but the shape and fit are a bit strange. The white camo is pretty in person, though. I'm 5'3" 140lbs and 32F for reference.

color: green  This is an attractive work out shirt with a nice crossover detail in the front.  The material is quick dry and sun resistant.  I ordered the XXL and it's very tight across the bust.  My advice is to order a size larger than usual

Breathes well, very lightweight while still feeling substantial. Extra flowly/loose bottom is quite a nice addition. Material is on par with other active wear, moisture wicking for sure, unsure on UV protection or how to even check that. Overall pretty nice though for generic clothing.

But it fits well through the torso. I'm 5'6" 160 pounds and ordered my normal size: large. I do like the fabric. Very cool to the touch and comfortable.
I ordered this top in a small.  It is true to size, slim fitting, but not tight.  The material is lightweight and comfortable.  It is quick drying and great for workouts!

It is a bit brighter pink in person than in the add. Nice soft material and fit wise I’d say it runs a bit small but it is made to be more fitted. But if you want it baggy size up. It is shorter in the front then the back for style.

评论概述: a little boxy, but still cute
评论详情: I am 140 lbs, 5'6", 36D, so after seeing the few reviews, I ordered up from my normal Medium to a Large to accommodate the girls. I'm glad I did because the pattern is printed onto white material, so when it stretches, it shows white. It needed to be larger so it didn't pull white across my chest.  It gapes a bit at the arm holes, so I may have my tailor put in a couple simple darts. It's a cute top, but I can't say the boxiness is doing me any favors.

They were pleased with the color and the fabric that this shirt has, as we prefer undergarments to remain un-observable. The shirt has traveled to a couple of attempts to learn pickleball, spin, and the inner workings of our laundry and returns looking brand new.  We are pleased with this well-made shirt.
